title: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: Bug 101187: The localization key is not being accepted when adding it. Description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart. Steps to reproduce: 1. In the properties file, leave the key blank, but make sure it has a valid value. Expected result: The chart title should be able to display the externalized text. Actual result: The externalized text is not being displayed.
OB: The externalized text is not being displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the properties file. 2. Leave the localization key blank. 3. Make sure the key has a valid value. 4. Verify that the externalized text is not being displayed in the chart title.
